job.title: Site Reliability Engineer- 100% Remote
job.description: are you a talented sre looking for a company that will value your skills and give you interesting projects to own this company has built a major saas product that focuses on mitigating risk and driving business insights they have amazing document management solutions for law firms and academic institutions lots of analytics involved with the company tooltbrgtltbrgtthey are a few thousand employees and are profitable and scaling this venture is a super exciting one they are spending mil to migrate their systems from aws to azure its become the ideal solution for them and they are committing to itltbrgtltbrgtthey are hiring sres to help them with this transition you should be skilled with aws or azure who have experience with terraform or cloudformation or any iac tool and any containerization is a plus as they will be using kubernetes within the new setup everyone will be hired on a contract to hire will be months as thats how theyve hired everyone weve placed over people with them and have a conversion rate so its truly a contract to hire great quality of life strong benefits up to k match high pto and great perks remoteltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtrequired skills ampamp experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtaws or azure experienceltligtltligtterraform or cloudformationltligtltligtkubernetes and dockerltligtltulgt ltstronggtthe offerltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtcompetitive salary up to hr wltligtltulgt ltstronggtyou will receive the following benefitsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtcompetitive health insuranceltligtltligtk up to match ltligtltligtremote scheduleltligtltligttuition reimbursementltligtltligtpet insuranceltligtltulgt applicants must be currently authorized to work in the united states on a fulltime basis now and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtposted byltstronggt alyssa valles
